CustomField.description: Point people to the main Chatter Group where they can ask questions or find links to important information (e.g. the current S1 Support Matrix).
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK('https://gus.my.salesforce.com/0F9B0000000068B','Click to find Current S1 Support Matrix')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Links you to the best place to ask questions or find important information, like the S1 Support Matrix for the current release.
CustomField.label: LINK to S1 Chatter Group
